response.explain: The previous action code was to turn on the oven, which was executed successfully without any errors. The lasagna is already inside the oven, so the next step is to wait for the lasagna to be cooked.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the oven
(2) Grasp the lasagna
(3) Put the lasagna inside the oven
(4) Turn on the oven
(5) Wait for the lasagna to be cooked
